slim_seo.title: Casey Lowrey - The Drake
slim_seo.description: When Casey Lowery’s grandfather passed away in 2023, he left him a caravan on the English coast—far from the music industry chaos Casey had spent years trying to make sense of. There, living with his dog and surrounded by nature, Casey reconnected with his roots and finished lekkerland, his debut album named after an Afrikaans word meaning “something pleasing.” Raised in Chesterfield and inspired by early 2000s pop icons, Casey chased fame as a teen, scoring a viral hit with “Trampoline” and landing a record deal—only to realize the pop machine wasn’t for him. Dropped during the pandemic, he returned home and found unexpected success on TikTok, where his funny, diaristic songs earned him millions of fans and a global touring career. Working closely with producer Raffer, Casey built lekkerland as a deeply personal, self-directed project, shaped by friendship, grief, therapy, and real-life stories. Tracks like “Not Ready,” “Caroline,” “Blue Cords,” and “Blood Line” reflect his mix of vulnerability and wit. Now with over 5 million followers, four sold-out tours, and his own management company, Casey is creating a more grounded, inclusive version of the music world—one where he and his fans can be entirely themselves.
